version_description:
- Happen to have an iPad Air 2 or the ginormous iPad Pro? Double your pleasure, double your fun with multitasking support.
- Our programmers say - 010100110111011101101001011001100111010000100000001100100010000001010011011101010111000001110000011011110111001001110100
- Various bug fixes
- Improved relations with marketing

Like our mobile banking app? Wait ’til you see our branches! Need help finding them? Our improved Branch & ATM locator will assist you with that. You can now search for branches and ATMs near a location you specify.

You want to access our improved Branch & ATM locator while logged in? No problem! We just added new links to the bottom of the slide-out menu that let you search for branches, ATMs, and even look up contact information while logged into your account.

Are you still trying to figure out why your new iPhone or iPad has 3D touch? Well, we let you access popular things like check deposit in a much simpler way. Try it out by pushing just a little harder on our app icon. (This works with 3D Touch capable devices, only.)

It has been a cold winter, so our developers have been staying warm by their monitors which means more bugs have been frozen and shattered!

Mobile Check Deposit: We know how much you enjoy depositing checks into your account – we gave that feature a makeover to improve your experience.

Members 1st Today Widget: Do you like Today Widgets on your iOS device? We do too! We added one with Quick-Links to the most common tasks for your convenience. Depositing a check was never faster with our new Today Widget and Touch ID: Once you install our new widget, simply tap on the Check Deposit Quick-Link, sign in with Touch ID, and you are ready to deposit your check.

Bug Fixes: You found bugs and we smashed them – it’s how we roll!
Push notifications are now available for your subscribed alerts.

• Want to personalize your debit card from your phone or tablet? We added this feature for your convenience.
• The developers can't stop dancing as bugs were eradicated.
• Our watch app now handles accounts better!

• You can now personalize your debit card and change your card image easily.
• iOS 10 compatibility

• Bug fixes and small enhancements
• Updated our watch app

Exciting Mobile Deposit improvements are here!
- Get your money faster
- New check amount detection
- Deposit into more of your products

As always, our new Mobile Deposit service offers everything you expect:
- Deposit a check 24/7 using our mobile app
- It’s fast, secure, and best of all - it’s free for eligible members

We fixed some minor bugs to keep the app running smoothly for you.
We also added a link to our privacy policy on the "Contact Us" page.

• iPhone X support - use the full display and Face ID
• A fresh look for the Mobile Deposit activity screen - now with emoji
• Small bug fixes, upgrade to Swift 4, lots of code moved around, and other programmer-y things
• Coming soon: Check your balances with Siri... Stay tuned!

• iPhone X support - use the full display and Face ID
• A fresh look for the Mobile Deposit activity screen - now with emoji
• Small bug fixes, upgrade to Swift 4, lots of code moved around, and other programmer-y things
• Coming soon: Check your balances with Siri... Stay tuned!

• Hey Siri, what is my checking balance?" – Siri can now show you your balances. To enable sign in to the app, go to User Settings -> Mobile Settings, and tap the Quick Balances button under the Siri header
• “Snap, snap, snap”…what was that? Oh that was just Mobile Deposit. It is now 50% faster
• Tightened up a few loose ends
• A few small bug fixes
We made a few improvements and fixed a few bugs to make your mobile banking experience even better.
We made a few improvements and fixed a few bugs to make your mobile banking experience even better.

Mobile Deposit Changes
- Starting August 1st we require that checks deposited through our app are endorsed on the back of the check - under the signature endorsement - with the following phrase: “for mobile deposit only”
- We upgraded our internal tools and systems to assist in the above regulation change
- We squashed a few bugs along the way

P.S.: We're sure you already know about the updated regulation and are subscribed to the Federal Reserve mailing list, but if that is not the case, you can read the full details here:
https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/files/bcreg20170531a1.pdf

For more info on Mobile Deposit:
https://www.members1st.org/products-services/electronic-mobile-services/mobile-deposit/
We made some improvements and fixed a few bugs to make your mobile banking experience even better.
We fixed a Mobile Deposit issue with the new iPhone Xs and iPhone Xs Max devices.
We fixed an issue where the app was sometimes closing down when it was being launched by tapping on a push notification.

We fixed a Mobile Deposit issue for devices in the iPhone X, XR, XS, and XS Max family.
We also introduced a few other improvements to make your mobile banking experience even better.

We added more details to our Debit and Credit Card notifications. To see these details simply 3D Touch or drag down on a push notification.
The Contact page now reflects our new Customer Service Department hours, effective May 6th, 2019.
We also introduced a few other improvements to make your mobile banking experience even better.
We made a few improvements and fixed a few bugs to make your mobile banking experience even better.
We made some improvements and fixed a few bugs to make your mobile banking experience even better.
We made some improvements and fixed a few bugs to make your mobile banking experience even better.
We fixed a Mobile Deposit issue that affected some iPhone 11 and iPhone 11 Pro devices
We made some improvements and fixed a few bugs to make your mobile banking experience even better.

At Members 1st, we work hard to protect your account security and identity. We are in the process of adding an even better means to secure your account(s) and your Members 1st Online Banking experience.

When you sign in, provide your current username and password. As part of our ramped-up security, you may be prompted to enter a one-time code during sign-in. The code will be sent to you via a means of your choosing: email, SMS (text message), or by a voice call, so it is important for you to make sure your contact information in Online Banking is correct. 

Adding this additional security layer further authenticates your identity and will help to prevent account fraud.  

Stay tuned for future security enhancements coming in 2020. 

Thank you for your continued business,
Your Members 1st Online Banking Team

• We are excited to launch a new feature within our mobile app! Our new MyConcierge™ feature will deliver account and branch updates, custom tips, product recommendations and special offers to make sure you are getting the most out of your money—all from your smartphone. In this initial roll-out, we will be starting with simple updates and communications. As we continue through the rest of this year, we have more enhancements planned to enable greater personalization and service—you’ll even be able to reach out directly to your personal concierge with just the click of the MyConcierge bell in your mobile app!

• Improvements/Fixes for Mobile Deposit
• Bug fix for our members with iPads
We made some improvements and fixed a few bugs to make your mobile banking experience event better.

Welcome to our upgraded mobile app! We’ve rolled out a new, more modern look - with more flexible ways to manage your money. New or expanded features include an enhanced dashboard to view and manage all your accounts, easier ways to add a product or service, centralized bill pay center and a new, more intuitive navigation. We’ve also added “MyConcierge™” to enable members receive special offers, support, advice and relevant product and service info anytime, anywhere. All the great things you love about banking with us today will not change – like quick and secure sign-in, easy mobile deposit and convenient alerts.

Fixed
• Addressed the issue when a unique series of swipes and button presses erased your saved credentials.

Enhancements to Mobile Deposit - We improved the quality of the images we capture to give you access to your funds more quickly in certain situations.
